description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 1/25/2006

Ridge wants Nick to stay away from Brooke’s children because he thinks that Brooke and Nick are more than just friends.  Ridge explains to Nick that he plans to win Brooke back and that he gets what he wants.  Ridge also wants Nick to treat Bridget with the respect that she deserves, for her sake as well as Brooke’s and Brooke agrees.  Meanwhile, Stephanie tells Massimo the marriage news, but he is afraid that letting Eric back into her life will ruin their chances at happiness together.  However Stephanie tells him not to worry.  The wedding is all set, but Eric considers calling it off because Felicia’s health is in a serious condition.  Jackie is very happy about her engagement with Eric and advises him to stay true to her.  Eric cannot believe how incredible Jackie is for being understanding and tells her that he will need her when his daughter dies.
